name: Change the dashboard style (rounded corners)
format:
<style>
/*Change button corner radius (rounded corners)*/
.md-button{             
    border-radius: 6px
}

/*Change card tiles radius (rounded corners)*/
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
    border-radius: 6px;
}

/*Change style atributes of tile titles (rounded corners)*/
.nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle{
    font-size:20px;
    font-weight:bold;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 10px;
}

/* Track */
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: #333333;
}
 
/* Handle */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: #F5560A;
  border-radius:10px;
}

/* Handle on hover */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
  background: #af560a;
}

</style>

label: Restore before update
payload: Be sure to make a backup

topic: Do you want to restore to version before update ?

tooltip: Check if any update is available, any update will be automatically displayed above, then select the desired version with the dropdown menu.

format:
Available version(s)

name: Send avaible update to dropdown menu
Save selected update version

label: Confirm update
payload: Are you sure you want to update ? This will erase your current flows, be sure to make a backup before

name: Arguments for the WGET command to get the selected version
Unzip command arguments
Bakcup current flow (in case) and copy the new version
Restart node red to apply changes
Changelog widget
format:
{{x.Version}}
  • {{c}}

rules.to: Error while fetching updates, check if your RPi is connected to internet

name: Initialisation Variable
Logo in toolbar
format:
<script id="clockScript1" type="text/javascript">
    var flag;
    $(function () {
        
        if(flag) return;
        
        //add logo
        var div1 = $('<div/>');
        var logo = new Image();

        logo.src = 'data:image/png;base64,'
        logo.height = 45;
        div1[0].style.margin = 'auto 10px auto auto';

        div1.append(logo);

        function addToToolbar() {
            var toolbar = $('.md-toolbar-tools');
            
            if(!toolbar.length) return;
            
            toolbar.append(div1);
            flag = true;
        }
        addToToolbar();
    });
</script>
